Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory51.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Why do we still have to fight... We already defeated the King...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv was in grief after the Demon King made her announcement. They had been moving together ever since she joined the game. To her, the Demon King was already a friend.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "But that is the Demon King's wish, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just like what Lucia said, the Demon King had no idea for power or anything. She even asked us to "stop" her.'}
{3: 'There must be a purpose.'}
{2: 'We must complete the game...', 3: '13', 4: 'This will be the last fight.', 5: '15'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'I think so too. But we probably need to ask herself for the real reason.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Let's finish her off and go back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Before facing the Demon King, how about we have a fight to decide the winner first?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu and Vera stopped and pointed their weapons toward us.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Before entering the game, we said this would be a race. Looking at the situation, it's no longer possible to decide the winner.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "That's why I'd like to propose a change in the rules. Let's fight right here, and the winners have the right to challenge the Demon King.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But we don't know the real power of the Demon King. What if we don't have sufficient strength to face the Demon King after this battle...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Easy. If you win, you can order us to join you, because you are the winners.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is that what you have been planning, Vera...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu and Vera were very particular about winning or losing. Although they never thought they would lose, Vera had put an extra insurance in place just in case.'}
{2: 'You will win either way. How cunning, Vera.', 3: '30', 4: 'Make sure you give everything you have.', 5: '32'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Whether you agree or not, we have decided to end it here.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Have you realized that we had been cruising along? No wonder you were top of your class.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I still don\'t think we should "decide" the winning team here, but it seems a fight is unavoidable.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's player versus player time then.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait a sec, which side should I join then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Oh, I need to make a decision too...', 3: '41', 4: 'Can you stay with me?', 5: '42'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yeah, we were in Vera's team...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Do you have no shame!?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "Just stay in Kamui's team. You are nothing but liabilities.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'How dare you call me a liability!? You arrogant, dark, narcissistic piece of ****!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'What are you laughing at, Kamui?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Alright, let's do this. We don't have much time left.", 4: '1'}
